title: Everything’s Closing | Guests: Steven Crowder & Stephen Moore | 3/13/20
description:
Coronavirus is a real threat, NOT a worldwide conspiracy to stop Trump! Take precautions, but don’t panic. BlazeTV’s Steven Crowder celebrates a billion YouTube views with a message from a very special fan. Bill O’Reilly breaks down the medical, social, political, and economic impacts of the coronavirus as the media hypes it up. And last night, the Federal Reserve announced a repo program ten times larger than the 2008 Bear Stearns loan! In today’s coronavirus update, the virus has hit the West, and everything is shutting down from concerts to schools to Disneyland. And Heritage Foundation fellow Stephen Moore argues that Trump should make big, bold moves and help the American people with tax cuts fast. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
